TopicTitle: Clicking on the Maneuver Node Hides Intercepts/AP/PE displays making it difficult to rendezvous. Videos showing KSP1 vs KSP2 within.

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.0.0.20892
Operating System: Windows 10
CPU+GPU+RAM: i9 9900K+3070ti+32GB

How KSP1 does it:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=03QODlQXYxE&t=10s

How KSP2 orbital data is being hidden:
https://youtu.be/J-yWXUzjN-c

Additional Information:
This issue makes anything to do with a maneuver node very difficult to do.
